abstract: The cable channel FX said on Halloween that it had ordered a second season of "American Horror Story," which is on track to become the highest-rated first season of any series it has shown.
snippet: The cable channel FX said on Halloween that it had ordered a second season of "American Horror Story," which is on track to become the highest-rated first season of any series it has shown.

headline.main: FX Adds Another Chapter to 'American Horror Story'
headline.print_headline: ‘American Horror Story’ Has Its Life Extended
